title: Feed Formulation for Beef Cattle
description: A cattle rancher needs to formulate a cost-effective feed ration that meets the nutritional requirements for their finisher cattle.

tasks.description: Identify the nutritional requirements for beef cattle in the finishing stage (e.g., protein, energy, minerals).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct nutritional targets.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current prices and nutritional content of available feed ingredients (e.g., corn, soybean meal, hay).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets up-to-date pricing and nutritional data.

tasks.description: Run a feed formulation optimization model to find the least-cost ration that meets all nutritional constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a feed recipe with specific percentages of each ingredient.
